short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Complete the busywork in your sales process 10x faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ctrl empowers revenue teams to bring data together from different apps to create their own workspaces - making it super fast to complete workflows, see the info they need & take action from a single view.
Our vision is to eliminate data silos and help people work in a simple & enjoyable way across contexts.
